name: UnstableTorment
description:
You find yourself in hell. Why? Doesn't matter. What does matter though is that Imps are coming to kill you. Not just that, being in hell makes your blood boil too so watch out!

Controls:
W A S D for Movement

E to toggle Rage Mode

Left Click to attack

Additional info:

The Game is endless!* You and your enemies will become stronger as the game goes on.

Rage Mode can only be toggled on if  your "Instability bar" is at least 1/3 full.
Fully depleting the "Instability bar" will regenerate some health.

Activating Rage Mode will make enemies stronger too.

*While there is an end I wish you good luck getting to it.
